item.title: Memory Resource Management in VMware ESX Server
item.description: VMWare ESX Server is a software layer designed to multiplex hardware resources among virtual machines running unmodified commodity operating systems. ESX Server, different to VMware Workstation, is a type 1 hypervisor, which means it runs directly on bare metal.

item.title: Xen and the Art of Virtualization
item.description: Xen is an x86 virtual machine monitor which allows multiple commodity operating systems to share conventional hardware in a safe and resource managed fashion, without sacrificing either performance or functionality.
